description: Execution contract for running the Proveniq Ledger DAG in Windsurf/Antigravity.

scheduling_rules.ready_condition: A node becomes READY when all its upstream dependencies have status SUCCEEDED.
prioritization: Phase 1 nodes before Phase 2 where possible
Security-critical roles (cto, lead_architect, compliance_officer, backend_devops_engineer, ai_safety_specialist, qa_specialist) have higher priority weights

artifact_protocol.storage: Git repo, object storage bucket, or Antigravity internal workspace
artifact_protocol.validation: Nodes must verify presence of required artifacts_in before RUNNING.

human_in_the_loop.gate_behavior: Node remains READY but cannot transition to RUNNING until human approval event is attached.
